endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all customer feedback and reviews aggregated from various platforms.
Submit a new piece of customer feedback for analysis.
Access a summary of customer feedback analysis for aggregated insights.
Retrieve a list of all products being monitored for feedback analysis.
Add a new product to the monitoring list for feedback analysis.
Retrieve detailed insights derived from the analyzed customer feedback.
Update the details of a specific product being monitored.
Remove a product from the monitoring list based on its ID.
Retrieve trend data based on customer feedback over specified time intervals.
Configure custom alerts based on specific feedback trends or insights.
